title: 1001-C
statement: C. Generate GHZ statetime limit per test1 secondmemory limit per test256 megabytesinputstandard inputoutputstandard outputYou are givenNqubits (1 ≤N≤ 8) in zero state. Your task is to create Greenberger–Horne–Zeilinger (GHZ) state on them:Note that forN= 1andN= 2GHZ state becomes statesandfrom the previous tasks, respectively.InputYou have to implement an operation which takes an array ofNqubits as an input and has no output. The "output" of your solution is the state in which it left the input qubits.Your code should have the following signature:namespace Solution {open Microsoft.Quantum.Primitive;open Microsoft.Quantum.Canon;operation Solve (qs : Qubit[]) : (){body{// your code here}}}
